text: Bellegra is a town and comune in the Metropolitan City of Rome, in the Lazio region of central Italy. Its original name had been Civitella (). The town council changed that name to its current one in 1880, out of the belief that the town lay on the site of an ancient town called Belecre, possibly from the Latin bella aegra (blood-stained wars).ComuniWeb.it "Bellegra" ==References== Category:Cities and towns in Lazio
title: Bellegra
